title: 11 Hours
description: A lawyer and a paralegal get trapped in an elevator — it sounds like the beginning of a bad joke, but it’s not a joke.It’s my life.It’s been hours with no sign of rescue, and the only thing I know for sure is that if I don’t manage to either get out of here or under him soon, I’m going to go insane.****This includes an intense breeding kink, some toxic behavior, and the pet name kitten. If that’s not your thing, this won’t be for you.
author: Octavia Jensen
